alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 03 at 12:38PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by showers and thunderstorms is possible WHERE...All Islands. WHEN...Through Monday. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. Landslides are also possible with saturated soils. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A trough to the northeast of the territory will move across the islands tonight into Monday. This trough will produce widespread showers and isolated thunderstorms tonight into Monday. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 1238 Aoauli Aso Sa Aperila 3 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO GAFUA... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega o le a mafua mai i timuga ma faititili o lo`o gasolo mai. NOFOAGA...Atumotu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Gafua. AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. E mafai fo`i ona tutupu mai sologa i mauga ona pe a umi timuga ma susu ai le eleele. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o lo`o i matu i sasa`e o le atunu`u o le a se`e mai i le po nanei aga`i atu i le Aso Gafua. O nei uiga loulou o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga ma faititili e taape ai i le po nanei e oo i le Aso Gafua. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
